Portfolio About me

About me

My name Artem

I immerse myself in the processes associated with the development of Web products and applications, I can and love to work in a team. Having experience in software and Web testing in the past, I quickly and accurately find potential bugs and existing shortcomings. I focus on details and have an analytical mind. I believe that writing code is an art that can be very useful. By trusting me with your task, you get a work of art that starts working within the agreed time frame.

Web-development

I feel love for my work, I am always positive and ready to pay special attention to tasks. Able to learn quickly and independently and devote a huge amount of time to developing new skills.

Quality Assurance

Testing and debugging skills are in my opinion a must for a web developer. To make things work properly, I test the code for errors and know how to fix them.

Knowledge of English

I have been studying English since elementary school and continue to improve my level by studying with an English-speaking teacher and living in different countries.

My experience

How can I be useful

Education

  • VKA A.F. Mozhaisky

    Specialty | St. Petersburg (2015-2020)
    The life curve led me to enroll in a military university, where I was educated as a radio engineer and gained important experience in interacting with different people. After graduation, I received a diploma of a specialist and began my development in the field of IT.

  • Yandex School

    QA Engineer professional training course (2021-2022)
    I decided to start my development in IT by studying QA, so I took a course in this area and received the necessary knowledge base, but after half a year of work in this segment, I decided to further focus on Web development.

  • Udemy

    Web development course (2022)
    Laid the foundation for further education. I have mastered the skills, thanks to which I can master any CMS from the inside, I began to study the work of the backend part, and I understand how to create the visual part of applications written in JavaScript frameworks and libraries.

Work experience

  • Yandex

    Assessor's projects (2022)
    Participation in the Yandex assessment project was the beginning of my real experience in the field of development for me. I honed all the skills acquired in the course of training in the QA profession and tested several projects of the company.

  • Federal Tax Service of Russia

    Test Engineer (2022)
    For me, this was the first offline job in the IT field, where I gained new knowledge about how work is organized in state-owned companies and the opportunity to use extraordinary tools to solve testing problems. We also managed to work with information security tools and autotest monitoring tools.

  • Habr Freelance

    Web-developer
    I got acquainted with the freelancing format quite recently and I consider it as a starting point and springboard for gaining experience in the field of Web development. At the moment I have several orders made and daily I am developing new projects

My skills

What do I use at work

HTML5

It is he who creates the framework of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure of your product

CSS3

This style language allows me to create absolutely any look for your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!

Java Script

This programming language allows you to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server, and much more.

Jquery

The Jquery library will speed up development. Without the need to integrate it into the project, we will not, but the skill of working with it is present

React

This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product for your purposes

Figma

The feature set of Figma focuses on user interface and user experience design, with an emphasis on real-time collaboration, utilising a variety of vector graphics editor and prototyping tools.

TypeScript

It is a strict syntactical superset of JavaScript and adds optional static typing to the language. It is designed for the development of large applications and transpiles to JavaScript.

Node.js

This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - "brains" that will perform actions that the user does not see

Git

Git is a distributed version control system: tracking changes in any set of files, usually used for coordinating work among programmers collaboratively developing source code during software development.

PHP

PHP is a general-purpose scripting language geared toward web development. PHP is used by 74.4% of all the websites whose server-side programming language we know.

SQL

Structured Query Language is a domain-specific language used in programming and designed for managing data held in a relational database management system (RDBMS), or for stream processing in a relational data stream management system (RDSMS).

Mongo.db

This is a non-relational database that will store your website or application data.
